column4: Can anyone help me? I recently restored GRUB2 using the livecd, and now my ubuntu boots into tty1 and not gnome
I tried startx, but it says "no screens found"
service gdm start says that its already running
How can I get X running again?
Anyone? How can I recover my gnome desktop?
maybe you could edit the sources in /etc/apt/sources.list,  have you got a network connection?
No network connections, I just got a terminal screen
just thought reinstalling ubuntu-desktop might fix your problem
It might, if I could get network connections
I don't get why it isn't working though. I haven't changed anything
stupid question perhaps - have you rebooted?
and this happened after editing grub?
